Detailed Description

low left point of each subaperture.

don't change the leading 5 elements. so that pts_t can be cast to loc_t

2009-12-08: Bug found: I set the origx, origy to the lower left point in the subaperture instead of the true edge. This is good for raytracing. But I used it as the saloc orig for mkg, which is really wrong. use powfs->saloc as the orig of subapertures. PTS just for ray tracing.
